summary: my favorite thing about jester/nott is (besides all the chaos dates) just how much they love and respect each other. nott gets...
question: my favorite thing about jester/nott is (besides all the chaos dates) just how much they love and respect each other. nott gets talked down to so often in this group but its so clear jester has always seen her as an equal. there's just a real understanding there that's so pure and good.
answer: i know right!! thats my favorite thing about them, they see each other as equals whereas everyone else sees them as kind of the young ones that need protection, even though nott is firmly placing herself in the role of team mom. like because theyre so silly and have their amazing chaos dates the rest of the party doesnt treat them as being as smart as they actually are. but together theyre so perfect. better together

reblog.comment: i know right!! thats my favorite thing about them, they see each other as equals whereas everyone else sees them as kind of the young ones that need protection, even though nott is firmly placing herself in the role of team mom. like because theyre so silly and have their amazing chaos dates the rest of the party doesnt treat them as being as smart as they actually are. but together theyre so perfect. better together

summary: Fjord it is.  Modeling a character that doesn’t wear a robe for once is a breath of fresh air. Slowly but surely the amount of...
caption:
Fjord it is.

 Modeling a character that doesn’t wear a robe for once is a breath of fresh air. Slowly but surely the amount of triangles per model is going down (1900 on this one) and I’m getting the hang of low poly. However I’m feeling a little worn, I’m probably giving them a short break and do some high poly stuff, test the waters and all that.

Also fuck volumetric lighting.

Twitter / Instagram     

[Made in blender]

summary: hey tumblr fam! i know a chunk of you are leaving this site, so this is your reminder that critrolecloset also exists on twitter...
body: hey tumblr fam! i know a chunk of you are leaving this site, so this is your reminder that critrolecloset also exists on twitter and instagram. i’ll still be posting on here per usual, but i understand that there’s a lot of change going on with people switching platforms. love you all!

blog.name: mrandmrsvex
blog.title: Mr. and Mrs. Vex, to be fair
blog.description:
Critical role fanblog in general, major Perc'ahlia trash in particular.  basically I just have a lot of feelings for Vox Machina and I want to scream them all at you.

THINGS THAT ARE TOTALLY COOL TO DO:
- reblogging any of my posts, screenshots and writing
- adding commentary to anything, or your own headcanons, or whatever
- shooting me a message with any random thing you wanna tell me, questions, writing prompts, I love it all
(if I don't react to a reblog/added comment/tags then sorry! My tumblr is really broken and I often don't see it for days. I DO TRY TO READ ALL TAGS ON REBLOGS OF MY POSTS THOUGH cause I love them. a lot.)

summary: Matt took a swig from his mug and then started chewing something and it took me wayyyy to long to realise it’s probably just ice...
body:
Matt took a swig from his mug and then started chewing something

and it took me wayyyy to long to realise it’s probably just ice from his drink

cause all I could think of was Travis and Brian playing FPS and eating cheetos out of martini glasses….

blog.name: trickyjesters
blog.title: take a chance, roll the dice
blog.description: Hi, I'm Ina, they/them, lvl 24 queer disaster, and apparently a warlock of Taliesin Jaffe helping him spread conspiracies. Welcome to my D&D/Critical Role sideblog. Please grab a healing potion and enjoy your stay. Watch out for the spoilers though; they're usually tagged, but they're sneaky lil things so you never know. This blog mostly runs on queue so replies might take a while. (I follow as frostbann; personal/fandom blog is voidblessed)

tags: stayed for the thirst and the story and the incredible friendship between the cast
oh yeah orion is ofc excluded from this. ew
summary: I'm gonna be completely honest with you, the main reason why I decided to check out this Critical Role thing my mutuals...
body:
I’m gonna be completely honest with you, the main reason why I decided to check out this Critical Role thing my mutuals constantly rbed onto my dash was my thirst for the entire cast, Marisha, Ashley and Liam ‘Black Henley’ O'Brien in particular.

Listen. I’m just a weak queer bitch, okay? I see hot people, I sma-, ahem, check out their D&D show.
